name: Vesna
description:
In this heartwarming re-imagination of Slavic lore, travel to Vyriy, home of the gods, a world full of mysteries and adventure at every turn.
Follow Vesna and her sister Morena as they battle their way through dust bunnies and frog minions and discover that destiny is not always written in stone.


Vesna is a turn-based, top down video game for Windows. Playing as the titular character Vesna, her sister Morena and the bog knave Dennis, use strategy to plan our your movements before attacking. Vesna's close range sweep and thrust attacks pair well with Morena's ice ping and ice wave attacks.


All sound effects and music from Sound Q

Substance Designer
Stylized Feathers / 3dex
